submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumDifference(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        andValues = set()
        n = len(nums)
        @cache
        def dfs(i, nd):
            nonlocal n
            if i == n: return
            nd &= nums[i]
            andValues.add(nd)
            dfs(i + 1, nd)
            dfs(i + 1, -1)
        
        dfs(0, -1)
        ans = inf
        for nd in andValues:
            ans = min(ans, abs(k - nd))
        
        return ans
